## group_by

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
mtcars.tb <- as_tibble(mtcars)
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% group_by(cyl) %>% do(browser())
```

找各組前三名
```{r}
mtcars.tb %>%
  group_by(cyl) %>%
  filter(rank(desc(hp)) < 4) %>%
  arrange(desc(cyl), desc(hp))
```
